dcterms:creator: Amir Shahroudy
Jun Liu
Tian-Tsong Ng
Gang Wang
dcterms:description: NTU RGB+D 60 contains 56,880 skeleton sequences across 60 action categories performed by 40 subjects. The dataset is used for evaluating action recognition methods with cross-subject and cross-view evaluation protocols.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: Jun Liu
Amir Shahroudy
Mauricio Perez
Gang Wang
Ling-Yu Duan
Alex C Kot
dcterms:description: NTU RGB+D 120 is an extension of NTU RGB+D 60 with 114,480 skeleton sequences across 120 action categories performed by 106 subjects. It includes a challenging cross-setup evaluation protocol.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: Chunhui Liu
Yueyu Hu
Yanghao Li
Sijie Song
Jiaying Liu
dcterms:description: PKU Multi-Modality Dataset (PKUMMD) contains nearly 20,000 skeleton sequences across 52 action categories. It is used for evaluating action recognition methods with a cross-subject protocol.
dcterms:title: PKU Multi-Modality Dataset (PKUMMD)
